name: capacitor-lancedb-example
description: E2E test app for capacitor-lancedb plugin

scripts.build:ios: cd ios/App && xcodebuild -workspace App.xcworkspace -scheme App -sdk iphonesimulator -destination 'platform=iOS Simulator,name=iPhone 16 Pro' -configuration Debug build CONFIGURATION_BUILD_DIR=$(pwd)/build/Debug-iphonesimulator | xcpretty || true
